newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi * Kelos Pelmand * lerthe61
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug where sender id of an EVE notification wasn't parsed correctly. * Fixed a visual bug in character monitor when active ship name exceeds panel width. * Fixed issues with HTML special characters in EVE mail titles. * Fixed a visual bug in cache timer error page of the API Key Importation window. * Fixed an issue where character list in API key management window is not updated when updating API key after an error. * Fixed a crash bug in Certificate browser. * Fixed a visual bug in Overview when skill training is completed and there is no skill in queue. * Fixed a visual bug of the monitor timer upon first selection of a character tab. * Fixed potential crash bug in ship loadouts feature. * Fixed a visual bug (completion date) in footer info when printing a plan. * Fixed a bug where skill level entries where removed after canceling in 'Remove entries from plan' window. * Last State Change info will now be shown correctly in Market orders monitor. * Last State Change info will now be shown correctly in Industry jobs monitor. * Fixed a visual bug in Industry jobs monitor where job state does not get updated when job is ready. * Fixed an bug where prerequisite skill for a blueprint was presented multiple times in tooltip, in the Skill Explorer. * Fixed a bug where clicking the 'copy details' in the exception handler window causes the operation to fail. * Fixed a visual bug in SkillExplorerWindow when using larger fonts settings.
== Enhancements ==
* Added support for Corporation type API keys. Corp Market orders and Industry jobs issued by a character are again available. * Improved the way EVEMon is handling notifications about EVE database inaccessibility and expands the range of notifications about database related errors. * Added support for unicode characters in EVE mail bodies and EVE notification texts. * Enhanced the way the columns are sized in each monitor. * Improved the way ignored characters and characters with more than one associated API key are displayed in API key deletion window. * Assigned buttons for 'Enter' or 'Esc' key pressing in API keys Importation window. Resolved issue with 'Import', 'Update' button not having focus when on last page. * Negative balance will be now shown in red. * MD5Sum check will now prevent from installing a corrupt EVEMon installer via the auto-updater. * Added auto-size ability via preferences menu item selection in each monitor with columns. * Enhanced the way column sizes in skill planner. * Upon a new release auto-update, the data files will get deleted, assuring that the next time EVEMon starts it loads the newest data files. * Changed the notification behavior on EVEMon startup. * Added a button in settings that opens the EVEMon's data directory. * Enhanced the visual feedback in ship loadout window. * Each ship loadout window now describes the plan it's bound to. Each Plan window can now open its own ship loadout window. * EveIDtoName file is now saved upon collecting the data and not when EVEMon closes. * An informative tooltip is now shown when hovering over an Industry job. * Skill selection updates through out the entire Skill Planner. Noticable effect when toggling the 'Owns book' in skill browser and 'Mark as owned/unowned' in plan queue.
== Misc ==
* Updated format of EFT exporting for CAK. * Removed the link in 'Help' to 'EVE Online Q&A' as the project is deleted. * Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better application.
